title: The Smirking Man
description: The only thing more dangerous than angering the God of War is befriending him.The world is his plaything. There can be no peace. He sees to that.He has many names. The Smirking Man, the Hanged God, the God of War wanders the world pitting nation against nation, city-state against city-state, brother against brother, and behind him the carrion birds feast.But there are others of his ilk. More than once they have disagreed with him and his methods. It was only a matter of time before it happened again...
author: M.E. Howard
